articles.title: Google Search, More Machine Now Than Man, Begins Requiring JavaScript - Daring Fireball
articles.content:
Kyle Wiggers, writing at TechCrunch:
Google says it has begun requiring users to turn on JavaScript,
the widely used programming language to make web pages
interactive, in order to use Google Sear… [+3863 chars]

articles.author: Frank Landymore
articles.title: Before Apple's AI Went Haywire and Started Making Up Fake News, Its Engineers Warned of Deep Flaws With the Tech - Futurism
articles.description: Apple engineers flagged major flaws with the "reasoning" abilities of top AI models: that it's mostly a front.
articles.content:
And they released it anyway.
News Flash, Buddy
Apple's recent stab at AI, Apple Intelligence, has largely been disappointing. In particular, its news summaries faced suched widespread criticism for… [+3022 chars]

articles.content: The Caltech community is responding to a natural disaster of historic scale as several wildfires continue to impact Southern California, including the Eaton fire and the Palisades fire. Many staff, f… [+5107 chars]
